name: ODYSSEE VENTURE
overview:
OdyssÃ©e Venture is the leading independent asset management company of private equity investment firm authorized by the AMF and manages 16 mutual funds in Innovation (FCIC), Local Investment Fund (PIF) and ISF funds representing more 320 million euros of assets under management.

Since 1999, Odyssey Venture is a specialist business growth and manages a portfolio of over 80 investments in diversified sectors such as Internet and telecommunications, computer and editing software, innovative industries and sciences of life.

It brings together a team of experienced private equity professionals who are able to support entrepreneurs at all stages of their business development, from seed to IPO and all formats of the investment business: venture capital, expansion capital, buyout capital (OBO, LBO, etc. ..) and special situations.
